Title: Episode 6
Plot: Lark Rise and Candleford rally around to show support for Laura's new role in the post office when Dorcas Lane is taken ill, but Laura feels pressure mounting when anonymous letters begin to arrive. Minnie sees the delivery of one of the letters, and fears that her past is catching up with her.
Writer: Gaby Chiappe, Bill Gallagher, Flora Thompason (work
